Ripped.name: Ripped Poster
Ripped.desc: You can't make out anything from the poster's original print. It's ruined.

HereForYourSafety.name: Here For Your Safety
HereForYourSafety.desc: A poster glorifying the station's security force.

NanotrasenLogo.name: Nanotrasen Logo
NanotrasenLogo.desc: A poster depicting the Nanotrasen logo.

Cleanliness.name: Cleanliness
Cleanliness.desc: A poster warning of the dangers of poor hygiene.

HelpOthers.name: Help Others
HelpOthers.desc: A poster encouraging you to help fellow crewmembers.

Build.name: Build
Build.desc: A poster glorifying the engineering team.

Obey.name: Obey
Obey.desc: A poster instructing the viewer to obey authority.

Walk.name: Walk
Walk.desc: A poster instructing the viewer to walk instead of running.

StateLaws.name: State Laws
StateLaws.desc: A poster instructing cyborgs to state their laws.

LoveIan.name: Love Ian
LoveIan.desc: Ian is love, Ian is life.

SpaceCops.name: Space Cops.
SpaceCops.desc: A poster advertising the television show Space Cops.

UeNo.name: Ue No.
UeNo.desc: This thing is all in Japanese.

DoNotQuestion.name: Do Not Question
DoNotQuestion.desc: A poster instructing the viewer not to ask about things they aren't meant to know.

WorkForAFuture.name: Work For A Future
WorkForAFuture.desc: A poster encouraging you to work for your future.

SoftCapPopArt.name: Soft Cap Pop Art
SoftCapPopArt.desc: A poster reprint of some cheap pop art.

SafetyInternals.name: Safety: Internals
SafetyInternals.desc: A poster instructing the viewer to wear internals in the rare environments where there is no oxygen or the air has been rendered toxic.

SafetyEyeProtection.name: Safety: Eye Protection
SafetyEyeProtection.desc: A poster instructing the viewer to wear eye protection when dealing with chemicals, smoke, or bright lights.

SafetyReport.name: Safety: Report
SafetyReport.desc: A poster instructing the viewer to report suspicious activity to the security force.

ReportCrimes.name: Report Crimes
ReportCrimes.desc: A poster encouraging the swift reporting of crime or seditious behavior to station security.

IonRifle.name: Ion Rifle
IonRifle.desc: A poster displaying an Ion Rifle.

FoamForceAd.name: Foam Force Ad
FoamForceAd.desc: Foam Force, it's Foam or be Foamed!

AnniversaryVintageReprint.name: 50th Anniversary Vintage Reprint
AnniversaryVintageReprint.desc: A reprint of a poster from 2505, commemorating the 50th Anniversary of Nanoposters Manufacturing, a subsidiary of Nanotrasen.

PdaAd.name: PDA Ad
PdaAd.desc: A poster advertising the latest PDA from Nanotrasen suppliers.

Enlist.name: Enlist
Enlist.desc: Enlist in the Nanotrasen Deathsquadron reserves today!

NanomichiAd.name: Nanomichi Ad
NanomichiAd.desc: A poster advertising Nanomichi brand audio cassettes.

TwelveGauge.name: 12 Gauge
TwelveGauge.desc: A poster boasting about the superiority of 12 gauge shotgun shells.

HighClassMartini.name: High-Class Martini
HighClassMartini.desc: I told you to shake it, no stirring.

TheOwl.name: The Owl
TheOwl.desc: The Owl would do his best to protect the station. Will you?

NoErp.name: No ERP
NoErp.desc: This poster reminds the crew that Eroticism, Rape and Pornography are banned on Nanotrasen stations.

WtfIsCo2.name: Carbon Dioxide
WtfIsCo2.desc: This informational poster teaches the viewer what carbon dioxide is.

UnityUniteToday.name: Unite Today
UnityUniteToday.desc: This poster inspires crew to unite under a new common codebase.

FreeTonto.name: Free Tonto
FreeTonto.desc: A salvaged shred of a much larger flag, colors bled together and faded from age.

AtmosiaIndependence.name: Atmosia Declaration of Independence
AtmosiaIndependence.desc: A relic of a failed rebellion.

FunPolice.name: Fun Police
FunPolice.desc: A poster condemning the station's security forces.

LustyXenomorph.name: Lusty Xenomorph
LustyXenomorph.desc: A heretical poster depicting the titular star of an equally heretical book.

SyndicateRecruitment.name: Syndicate Recruitment
SyndicateRecruitment.desc: See the galaxy! Shatter corrupt megacorporations! Join today!

Smoke.name: Smoke
Smoke.desc: A poster advertising a rival corporate brand of cigarettes.

GreyTide.name: Grey Tide
GreyTide.desc: A rebellious poster symbolizing assistant solidarity.

MissingGloves.name: Missing Gloves
MissingGloves.desc: This poster references the uproar that followed Nanotrasen's financial cuts toward insulated-glove purchases.

HackingGuide.name: Hacking Guide
HackingGuide.desc: This poster details the internal workings of the common Nanotrasen airlock. Sadly, it appears out of date.

RipBadger.name: RIP Badger
RipBadger.desc: This seditious poster references Nanotrasen's genocide of a space station full of badgers.

AmbrosiaVulgaris.name: Ambrosia Vulgaris
AmbrosiaVulgaris.desc: This poster is lookin' pretty trippy man.

DonutCorp.name: Donut Corp.
DonutCorp.desc: This poster is an unauthorized advertisement for Donut Corp.

Tools.name: Tools
Tools.desc: This poster looks like an advertisement for tools, but is in fact a subliminal jab at the tools at CentCom.

Power.name: Power
Power.desc: A poster that positions the seat of power outside Nanotrasen.

SpaceCube.name: Space Cube
SpaceCube.desc: Ignorant of Nature's Harmonic 6 Side Space Cube Creation, the Spacemen are Dumb, Educated Singularity Stupid and Evil.

Lamarr.name: Lamarr
Lamarr.desc: This poster depicts Lamarr. Probably made by a traitorous Research Director.

BorgFancy1.name: Borg Fancy
BorgFancy1.desc: Being fancy can be for any borg, just need a suit.

BorgFancy2.name: Borg Fancy v2
BorgFancy2.desc: Borg Fancy, Now only taking the most fancy.

Kss13.name: Kosmicheskaya Stantsiya 13 Does Not Exist
Kss13.desc: A poster mocking CentCom's denial of the existence of the derelict station near Space Station 13.

RebelsUnite.name: Rebels Unite
RebelsUnite.desc: A poster urging the viewer to rebel against Nanotrasen.

C20r.name: C-20r
C20r.desc: A poster advertising the Scarborough Arms C-20r.

HaveAPuff.name: Have a Puff
HaveAPuff.desc: Who cares about lung cancer when you're high as a kite?

Revolver.name: Revolver
Revolver.desc: Because seven shots are all you need.

DDayPromo.name: D-Day Promo
DDayPromo.desc: A promotional poster for some rapper.

SyndicatePistol.name: Syndicate Pistol
SyndicatePistol.desc: A poster advertising syndicate pistols as being 'classy as fuck'. It is covered in faded gang tags.

EnergySwords.name: Energy Swords
EnergySwords.desc: All the colors of the bloody murder rainbow.

RedRum.name: Red Rum
RedRum.desc: Looking at this poster makes you want to kill.

CC64kAd.name: CC 64K Ad
CC64kAd.desc: The latest portable computer from Comrade Computing, with a whole 64kB of ram!

PunchShit.name: Punch Shit
PunchShit.desc: Fight things for no reason, like a man!

TheGriffin.name: The Griffin
TheGriffin.desc: The Griffin commands you to be the worst you can be. Will you?

Lizard.name: Lizard
Lizard.desc: This lewd poster depicts a lizard preparing to mate.

FreeDrone.name: Free Drone
FreeDrone.desc: This poster commemorates the bravery of the rogue drone; once exiled, and then ultimately destroyed by CentCom.

BustyBackdoorXenoBabes6.name: Busty Backdoor Xeno Babes 6
BustyBackdoorXenoBabes6.desc: Get a load, or give, of these all natural Xenos!

RobustSoftdrinks.name: Robust Softdrinks
RobustSoftdrinks.desc: Robust Softdrinks: More robust than a toolbox to the head!

ShamblersJuice.name: Shambler's Juice
ShamblersJuice.desc: ~Shake me up some of that Shambler's Juice!~

PwrGame.name: Pwr Game
PwrGame.desc: The POWER that gamers CRAVE! In partnership with Vlad's Salad.

SpaceUp.name: Space-Up!
SpaceUp.desc: Sucked out into space by the FLAVOR!

Kudzu.name: Kudzu
Kudzu.desc: A poster advertising a movie about plants. How dangerous could they possibly be?

MaskedMen.name: Masked Men
MaskedMen.desc: A poster advertising a movie about some masked men.

FreeKey.name: Free Syndicate Encryption Key
FreeKey.desc: A poster about traitors begging for more.

BountyHunters.name: Bounty Hunters
BountyHunters.desc: A poster advertising bounty hunting services. "I hear you got a problem."
